verses.name: 1 Chronicles 21:27
verses.text: And the Lord commanded the angel; and he put up his sword again into the sheath thereof.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 21:28
verses.text: At that time when David saw that the Lord had answered him in the threshingfloor of Ornan the Jebusite, then he sacrificed there.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 21:29
verses.text: For the tabernacle of the Lord, which Moses made in the wilderness, and the altar of the burnt offering, were at that season in the high place at Gibeon.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 21:30
verses.text: But David could not go before it to enquire of God: for he was afraid because of the sword of the angel of the Lord.
